results.title: The effect of vasodilators on aspirin-induced antagonism of t-PA thrombolysis.
results.text_hl: Using this @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbit@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Thromboembolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013923 @@@thromboembolic stroke@@@, this hypothesis is now expanded to compare two clinically relevant anti-@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ agents, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (NO-dependent) and @CHEMICAL_Hydralazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006830 @@@hydralazine@@@ (NO-independent), for their ability to improve t-PA-mediated clot lysis following @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ pre-treatment.

citations.NLM: Bednar MM, Gross CE, Howard DB, Russell SR, Ellenberger C. The effect of vasodilators on aspirin-induced antagonism of t-PA thrombolysis. Neurol Res. 2001 Oct;23(7):745-50. PMID: 11680515
citations.BibTeX: @article{11680515, title={The effect of vasodilators on aspirin-induced antagonism of t-PA thrombolysis.}, author={Bednar MM and Gross CE and Howard DB and Russell SR and Ellenberger C}, journal={Neurol Res}, volume={23}, number={7}, pages={745-50}}

results.title: Coronary artery disease associated with factor V Leiden mutation: a case report.
results.text_hl: Since there was no history of @<m>DISEASE_Thromboembolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013923 @@@thromboembolic@@@ events, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was discharged using only @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Ferreira RM, Villela PB, Boechat JA, Mansur Filho J. Coronary artery disease associated with factor V Leiden mutation: a case report. Turk Kardiyol Dern Ars. 2019 Mar;47(2):148-152. PMID: 30874510
citations.BibTeX: @article{30874510, title={Coronary artery disease associated with factor V Leiden mutation: a case report.}, author={Ferreira RM and Villela PB and Boechat JA and Mansur Filho J}, journal={Turk Kardiyol Dern Ars}, volume={47}, number={2}, pages={148-152}}
